Chinese.name: CDN日志转存S3
Chinese.description: 本函数由CDN日志转存任务创建，请勿删除，否则删除后会导致转存任务同步删除。
Chinese.attention: 必须指定环境变量 TARGET_S3_SECRET_ID、TARGET_S3_SECRET_KEY、TARGET_S3_REGION、TARGET_S3_BUCKET、TARGET_SCF_REGION、TARGET_CDN_HOSTS; 可选环境变量 TARGET_S3_PATH

English.name: CDNSaveLogsIntoS3
English.description: Created by the CDN, do not delete it, otherwise causes the cdn log dump task failed.
English.attention: Must assign environment variables:TARGET_S3_SECRET_ID、TARGET_S3_SECRET_KEY、TARGET_S3_REGION、TARGET_S3_BUCKET、TARGET_SCF_REGION、TARGET_CDN_HOSTS; optional environment variables: TARGET_S3_PATH
